market_entry.name: Startup Rule Engine
market_entry.description:
Application that provides a PDI-based alternative to the XActions mechanism. It allows the user to configure Kettle jobs and transformations to be run upon specific events, such as upon session login or server startup.

Report here any issues or suggestions for improvement
market_entry.author: Webdetails
market_entry.installation_notes:
You can run the Startup Rule Engine as an administrator from the Tools menu. On the first server restart, YOUR SERVER MAY CRASH, as the application will patch your installation and edit system files. It will also create the folder pentaho-solutions/system/startupRules and populate it with some sample jobs and transformations.
Upon the second server restart, the Startup Rule Engine will be operational.
